Stefan is everything SÃ¢â‚¬â„¢renaty swears to avoid. He is carefree and charismatic. He is primitive, complicated and a total badass. He makes her melt like fine chocolate under a hot summerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sun the first time their eyes meet. There is something about him, and she makes it her mission to find out.

When he meets SÃ¢â‚¬â„¢renaty James, he is not prepared for what comes over him because for the first time ever, a girl leaves him breathless. Now, his primary responsibility is to keep her safe.
